mapper.sql: pro_number ,pro_need ,pro_type ,pro_date,application_dept,pro_applicant,applicant_tel,pro_module,business_principal ,base_principal, pro_manager,pro_status ,is_up_database ,is_up_structure, pro_operation ,is_ref_cerificate ,is_advance_production , not_advance_reason , pro_advance_result ,not_production_impact,identifier,identifier_tel ,pro_checker,checker_tel ,validation,development_leader,approver,update_operator, remark , unusual_reason_phrase,urgent_reason_phrase ,completion_update,early_implementation,influence_use, influence_use_reason,influence_use_inf,operating_time,production_deployment_result,is_operation_production,mail_recipient,mail_copy_person, pro_pkg_status,pro_pkg_time,pro_pkg_name,mail_leader,svntab_name

jiraWorklogKey, issuekey, timeSpnet, subtaskName, assignment_department, name, displayName, devp_lead_dept, comment, createdTime, startedTime, updatedTime, epicKey, epicCreator, registerFlag, roleType, case_writing_number, case_execution_number, case_completed_number
jiraWorklogKey, issuekey, timeSpnet, subtaskName, assignment_department, name, displayName, devp_lead_dept, comment, createdTime, startedTime, updatedTime, epicKey, epicCreator, registerFlag
mapper.select: select c.department department, c.ytb yingHours, c.deight daHours, c.xeight xiaoHours, c.ytb-c.deight-c.xeight weiHours from (select b.department, count(b.fullname) ytb, count(case when a.totaltime>=28800 then 1 else null end) deight, count(case when 28800 > a.totaltime then 1 else null end) xeight from sys_user b left join (select sum(timeSpnet) totaltime,displayName,assignment_department from t_working_hours where LEFT(startedTime,10) = #{selectTime} GROUP BY displayName) a on b.fullname=a.displayName group by b.department ) c

select a.fullname displayName, IFNULL(sum(b.timeSpnet),0) AS sumTime, department devp_lead_dept from sys_user a left join t_working_hours b on a.fullname=b.displayName where epicKey = #{epicKey} group by a.fullname

select a.fullname displayName, IFNULL(sum(b.timeSpnet),0) AS sumTime, department devp_lead_dept, ((select count(1) FROM (select DISTINCT epicKey from t_working_hours where displayName = #{displayname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ISNULL(epicKey)=0 and LENGTH(trim(epicKey))>0 and YEARWEEK(date_format(startedTime,'%Y-%m-%d')) = YEARWEEK(#{selectTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})) a) ) sumDept from sys_user a left join t_working_hours b on a.fullname=b.displayName and YEARWEEK(date_format(b.startedTime,'%Y-%m-%d')) = YEARWEEK(#{selectTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) where a.fullname = #{displayname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by a.fullname

select a.fullname displayName, IFNULL(sum(b.timeSpnet),0) AS sumTime, department devp_lead_dept, ((select count(1) FROM (select DISTINCT epicKey from t_working_hours where displayName = #{displayname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ISNULL(epicKey)=0 and LENGTH(trim(epicKey))>0 and LEFT(startedTime,10) like CONCAT('%',#{selectTime},'%') ) a) ) sumDept from sys_user a left join t_working_hours b on a.fullname=b.displayName and LEFT(b.startedTime,10) like CONCAT('%',#{selectTime},'%') where a.fullname = #{displayname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by a.fullname

select sum(timeSpnet) timeSpnet ,
from ( select
from t_working_hours where displayName = #{displayname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and YEARWEEK(date_format(startedTime,'%Y-%m-%d')) = YEARWEEK(#{selectTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) )c GROUP BY c.epickey

select sum(timeSpnet) timeSpnet ,
from ( select
from t_working_hours where displayName = #{displayname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and LEFT(startedTime,10) like CONCAT('%',#{selectTime},'%') )c GROUP BY c.epickey

select dept_name devp_lead_dept , dept_manager_name displayname, (select sum(1) from sys_user where department = #{devpLeadDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) sumDept from t_permi_dept where dept_name = #{devpLeadDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select sum(timeSpnet) timeSpnet ,
from ( select
from t_working_hours where assignment_department = #{devpLeadDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and YEARWEEK(date_format(startedTime,'%Y-%m-%d')) = YEARWEEK(#{selectTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) )c GROUP BY c.epickey

select sum(timeSpnet) timeSpnet ,
from ( select
from t_working_hours where assignment_department = #{devpLeadDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and LEFT(startedTime,10) like CONCAT('%',#{selectTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') )c GROUP BY c.epickey
select sum(1) sumTime FROM t_permi_user
select sum(timeSpnet) timeSpnet , roleType from t_working_hours where epicKey = #{epickey} GROUP BY roleType
